# tcoRs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tcoRs is to provide a series of wrappers and methods that make automated data pulling for UVM TCORS projects easy. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of tcoRs like so:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ajbarrows/tcoRs")
```

## Examples

Gathering main trial enrollment data:

```{r example}
library(tcoRs)
## basic example code
```
